function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of critical reflexivity in urban soundscapes research","Impact":"Unbalanced power dynamics, limited perspectives, and biased analysis of cities","Mitigation":"Encouraging diverse voices, perspectives, and experiences in urban soundscapes research","Technologies":"Digital platforms for sharing and integrating diverse perspectives","People":"Academics, researchers, urban communities","Owner":"Academics, research institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient consideration of the impact of digital methodologies on public health","Impact":"Potential for increased contagious disease propagation due to limited awareness and mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Educating and raising awareness about public health risks in digital research methodologies","Technologies":"Online education platforms, digital communication tools for public health outreach","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, communities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
